answers.answer: I am right there with you.  I am 28- soon to be 29- and have gone from 120lbs and a size 6 to 200 and a size 18.  I am willing to offer whatever support I can to help you on the road to a happier you, if you are willing to do the same.  You may have a little more that you want to lose than I do but 70 extra pounds on a 5ft body is a lot- I'm here for you and can understand where you're coming from........we CAN do this!

Whoa there - calm down.  Welcome to the community!!There are a lot of us who need to lose more than a few pounds.  Have you read some of the other posts?  There are some that need to lose a lot, some already have lost a lot and some just a few.Have you checked with your doctor to make sure you don't have a medical issue that might prevent weight loss - such as thyroid, pre-diabetes/insulin resistance, etc?That said, please give us an idea of what types of food/how often you eat.  What types and how often do you exercise?Last but certainly not least, please read some of the other posts - there are some excellent ideas and they apply to everyone, whether you need to lose a little or a lot.Come back here often to get support and motivation.
Welcome to the community.  Hope to see you both here on a regular basis.Check out the games, challenges, etc - we have lots of fun.  Good luck to you both.

question: i just want to get rid of this weight i cant belive i ever let myself get this fat i hate how fat i am and i just want to be me again i was so outgoing and always laughing now im almost 30 i weigh 250 from 135 befor kids starting 11 years ago i just want to be me and start taking care of me to i love eveything about my life  besides being as big as i am please post if im not alone it seems like most on here only have a few pounds to lose not alot like me i need help
title: Dose anyone feel
